name: Heavenly Battle
description:
In Heavenly Battle you will be able to :
- Fly on a plane
- Destroy lots of different enemies
- Develop your plane
- Be cruising for a bruising
- Kill your time
- Kill lots of bosses!
- An interesting ending?
- Secret mode after full walkthrough for "hardcore-players"?
-AND ALL THIS AMAZING BRILLIANCE in retro-style directly in televisor in your display!
